latestSignals.signal: Ecovadis hosting Sustain 2026 event Mar 2-3 in Paris. Major procurement/sustainability leaders attending. Company actively publishing thought leadership.
latestSignals.recommendation: Use Sustain 2026 as conversation point in Wed pilot kickoff. Ask who's attending, offer to connect.

latestSignals.signal: Reddit posts (Mar 2025) mention 'soft layoffs' at Neo Financial. Company denies 'structured layoffs' but admits 'driven efficiencies'.
latestSignals.recommendation: Validate budget before investing more time. Ask direct questions about hiring freeze/budget availability.

latestSignals.signal: Fleetio very active - exhibiting at NAFA, GFX, Work Truck Week, CONEXPO in 2026. Publishing operational best practices content. Healthy growth signals.
latestSignals.recommendation: Solid prospect. Thu meeting should focus on their scaling challenges.

latestSignals.signal: EvenUp actively expanding - launched Communication Agents + Next-Gen AI Drafts Suite, presenting at National Trial Lawyers Summit 2026, actively hiring for revenue kickoff. $1B valuation company.
latestSignals.recommendation: Re-engage immediately. 105 days stalled on $50K pilot is too long for a company this hot. They're in growth mode and spending on tools.

latestSignals.signal: Neo Financial raised $650M+ total funding. Ranked #1 on Canada's Top Growing Companies 3 years running. Deloitte Enterprise Industry Leaders #1 (2025).
latestSignals.recommendation: Strong company validation. Push for trial start - this is a high-quality logo worth pursuing.

aiRecommendations.rationale: Perfect mission alignment (9/10 fit). Explicitly funds 'innovations that strengthen disaster response'. Rolling deadline means no waiting.
Added $30M contingency fund specifically due to FEMA uncertainty. Early adopter mindset. Perfect timing.

aiRecommendations.recommendation: Build AI matching as core feature
aiRecommendations.rationale: Every major funder (Bezos, Google, Schmidt) prioritizing AI for climate/disaster. Table stakes for credibility.
Can't win against Palantir on their turf. WebEOC users are frustrated and accessible. Different buyer profile.
Google provides awareness, SOS provides coordination. Complementary. Google.org already funds this space.
